m_szDocTitle: Linde joins DOE's H2USA to help promote fuel... -- MURRAY HILL, N.J. and NEW PROVIDENCE, N.J., Jan. 14, 2014 /PRNewswire/ --
m_szDocSumamry: × www.lindeus.com.  (PRNewsFoto/Linde North America) MURRAY HILL, N.J. and NEW PROVIDENCE, N.J., Jan. 14, 2014 /PRNewswire/ --  Linde North America has joined the U.S. Department of Energy's newly formed H2USA, a public-private partnership focused on advancing hydrogen fueling infrastructure to support cleaner transportation energy options for U.S. consumers. (Logo:  http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20130530/NY23246LOGO-b ) Linde North America, is a member of The Linde Group - one of the world's largest hydrogen energy producers and one of the earliest entrants into the hydrogen energy arena.
